definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: prophet, acc. to 2Ki 14:25 he was [[הַנׇּבִיא]] son of [[אֲמִתַּי]], fr. [[גַּת הַחֵפֶר]] and predicted the recovery of Isr.'s territory which Jerob. II effected; he is also the principal figure of the Book of Jonah: Jon 1:1 ([[בֶּן־אֲמִתַּי]]), v:Jon 1:3, v:Jon 1:5, v:Jon 1:7, v:Jon 1:15, Jon 2:1, Jon 2:1, Jon 2:2, Jon 2:11, Jon 3:1, Jon 3:3, Jon 3:4, Jon 4:1, Jon 4:5, Jon 4:6, Jon 4:6, Jon 4:8, Jon 4:9.
